website_summaries.verdict: Heats enough stones for personal use or a single client in less than 10 minutes, without the fuss of water.
pros: Waterless clamshell style heater that comes with 6 large and 6 small stones
Heating elements in each side brings stones to 122 degrees in only 10 minutes
cons: Doesn't hold a lot of stones

customer_reviews.title: This is what every spa should use
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously amazing! It's so much better than having huge pots of water and having to deal with issues of bacteria growing in the water. It can easily be sanitized and the rocks can be washed separately. It heats up at a good pace - not too slow or too fast. The rocks were easy to handle and didn't scald my hands. I highly recommend this to any therapist that HATES using hot stones with water.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I received the product within two days. I plugged it in the wall and it had an electric surge with fire by the cord and a horrendous smell. Don't waste your money. Didn't even use it once. I wrote this review and within 30 minutes they added a positive review. Can't be true, it's not a verified purchase. Watch out people. They are not even letting me return it now are they replacing it, it's a scam.
customer_reviews.author: armine movsisyan

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhmazing purchase for my business!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I’m a seasoned licensed massage therapist...I often shy away from hot stone due to the risk of burning myself and my client. Gave these a shot and they are just right! I love how small and compact their seashell carrier is as well! Heating time is roughly 10minutes! I was shocked! Love it! Taking these home with me tonight just because of how easy and portable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product both aesthetically and functionally. Pros: Heats quickly Has a lovely design Portable Heats rocks at a hot, but handable temp. Can be left on for several hours Cons: Stones lose heat quickly Slightly annoying and messy to have to open and close when exchanging stones (unless you leave it open it or do not exchange stones) Can not adjust temp. I would definitely recommend 😺
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: heats up fast and cleanup is easy. I use isopropyl alcohol to clean unit
customer_reviews.text: No more crockpots! Stones dont keep heat as long as traditional hot stone devices. but the tradeoff is worth it. heats up fast and cleanup is easy. I use isopropyl alcohol to clean unit. and traditional cleaners for stones.
customer_reviews.author: ryanCMT

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for warming stones, but it will warm them to the point they are too hot, so be careful. Taking them straight out of the warmer and placing them directly on the skin can be too hot. I found that rotating them back to the warmer once they started cooling down and replacing them with 'fresh' ones worked well. The rocks retained their heat fairly well and I was able to give a nice massage. However; I'm not an expert and have never used hot stones before, so others may work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast these heat up, and how it gives me more hands on time with my clients. Sometimes they can get a little too hot, so I just set them aside to cool before using. There are added toe stones in my picture that does not come with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carrell

customer_reviews.title: The solution to my hot stone needs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hot stone warmer and have been using it for over a month at my work. I find it easy to take to work with me and so much nicer then the hot stone warmers at my work. The reason its my fave is because the stones stay the perfect temperature and heat quickly. I also love that the stone stack and wash super easy. The only weird thing is the little mermaid look which I like but might turn some people away.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient way to enjoy a hot stone massage
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient way to enjoy a hot stone massage. You do not have to hassle with a crock pot and water. Just plug in and the stones ate heated in approximately 10 minutes. However, unit is a little over priced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Montie09

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this once to do a Treatment and it worked well! Today I had another appointment booked and expected that since the light came on it was heating when I attempt to use the stones the machine was Ice cold! No heat!
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Not for full body hot stone/ good enough for Spot treating
customer_reviews.text: It can get fairly warm (some might say hot) when heating with lid closed. But for some clients it’s just not hot enough. Stones don’t hold the heat as long either. Good for Spot treating small areas, or one big area. But Wouldn’t recommend for a full body hot stone service. Pro: lid snaps shut which makes it easy to carry around and it’s not very heavy. Fits in my multi pocket table bag with space to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bianka R.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that these Stones would not get hot enough as the ones I'm used to it work but they do a great job easier to handle easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home massages
customer_reviews.text: They heat up nice and works well. They are a little heavy and you have to make sure that it's latched or the heavy stones will fall out. I only with they were polished stones, and not dusty.
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my hair salon and day spa and we love it! Great product it arrived quick and in perfect Condition.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use. No mess. Hits up quick. Rocks come off hot but not burning.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice and clean. I don't make a mess like the other stones that heat up in the water. Plus easy to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LMT approved!
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but it was fantastic. Even having to close and open it every time, cant do better for the price
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Glover

customer_reviews.title: My clients love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! The stones can be a little difficult to clean if you wait too long, so I would suggest using if you can clean them within 30 minutes of use. I use my other flat stones in this as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: keeps a great consistent temperature. It fits my stones perfectly and I really love how well quick it heats the stones.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it heats up quickly, easy to clean up. My clients absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: TLP60

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Omg i was skeptical at first, but this has proven me wrong. As an outcall Massage Therapist these are perfect they fit in my backpack and they are easy to clean. Best invention Ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie mijangos

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a small practice
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly. Doesnt hold heat as ling as a regular crockpot style warmer but served the purpose in my tiny massage room.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast and no need for a messy crockpot
customer_reviews.author: Lucas T. Czechowicz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Stones do not get as hot as those submersed in water. Okay for me.  Just put back in warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy to heat up without water. However, the stones don't maintain heat as long as the ones that are put in water. No mess.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: It’s so nice to have in a compact case but also heating element. Easy to clean, gets warm within 10-12 min.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I love, love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this product! I am a licensed massage therapist, and sometimes I go to my client's houses. This product is amazing. I love it! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Rivera-Placido

customer_reviews.title: Product burned someone!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is terrible. Burned me and has no temp control
customer_reviews.author: Cs

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this portable Hot Stone. It doesn't get real hot but it is enough to make the client feel good. You have change stones often but it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. To achieve maximum effect, rocks have to be charge almost 2hrs. Highly recommend wearing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: kaydee

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Hot Stone warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Exactly what I was hoping for. Easy to use, and clean up is simple with no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Testa

customer_reviews.title: Better than professional hot stone massage!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable product! Better than professional hot stone massage! Total winner!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hi. Great product! I loved it. But I’m missing one stone. I got 11 instead of 12.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are okay warming oven is good rocks kinda of leave white film on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No fuse no muse I love this set use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: grigb2105

customer_reviews.title: I love the compact size
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size. They heat quick just wish they sold more stones separately.. I’m happy I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!  Prompt Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten a chance to use it yet but it came earlier than expected and I am very happy about how everything looked. Love the design and the stones feel very nice. I cannot wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Princess MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for Mother Day and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast heating of stones, maybe 15 minutes tops. Stones retain heat and then reheat quickly for reuse. Soap and water to clean, towel dry then spray with thyme oil mixed with water to sanitize. Best part is the outside doesn't heat up at all. I highly recommend to all massage therapists who use stones or who want to start using them.
customer_reviews.author: Sora Massage & Bowenwork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to heat stones. Only takes about ten or fifteen minutes to heat through, and no problem leaving stones on for an extended time. Does not overheat.
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: Watch how long you leave them in for
customer_reviews.text: These work great, they get a little too hot if left too long but I just play with the rock or set it aside before placing it on the skin. So far I have used it three times.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hot stone unit!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Just what my daughter wanted. It is so much easier and cleaner than the heating units with water. Easily portable and heats very quickly. She Loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Snow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and easy to use/clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these! As a traveling massage therapist, I use these in various settings. They’re lightweight, smooth, and easy to clean. They fit perfectly in the palm. Will recommend these to all my colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: CanDax Productions

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: warms up just as good as in the boiling water, good product
customer_reviews.author: Haydar T. Huyukluoglu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and doesnt get too hot. works good and quick warm up
customer_reviews.author: jennifer roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice product Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought this as my second set for private massages. Easy to use and clean. Stones heat up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stone is too small and gets cold soon.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute, but stone is too small and gets cold in a minute, doesn't stay warm longer. I stopped using this and it is in garage on the junk pile. As price, I should not recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: The best hot stone travel product
customer_reviews.text: The stones and warmer are perfect for on the go massage therapy, the weight is nominal compared to the added benefit to my services, because they're flat they're quick to cool down but they reheat very quickly
customer_reviews.author: ToriAnn Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Fast clean up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little hot stone warmer! I thought I was only going to use it for home visits but I find myself using it in my spa now too. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These rocks get hot fast! (Approx 15 mins) Whatever you do dont set/place on bare skin! Great product, works as described.
customer_reviews.author: bill mcclellan

customer_reviews.title: great for the travel massage therapist!
customer_reviews.text: works amazing for traveling door to door! easy to clean, gets pretty hot so beware of that. looks cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I’m a massage therapist. I love these stones. They are handy and keep a great temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Zara N Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy portability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mobile massage clients and it works like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: nice because there is no water involved
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot at my wellness center, and it seems to hold up well... nice because there is no water involved.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste G. Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to regulate at a body tolerant level for massage therapy. Not easy to regulate with separate water.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Therapist’s Choice Portable Hot Stone Warmer with 12 Stones
product_meta.description: Material of stone : Calcium Carbonate. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07816Y7XX
feature_bullets: Comes Complete with 6 Large(2.75”x0.71”) & 6 Small(1.8”x0.71”) Hot Stones
Lightweight (4.4 pounds w/stones) and Portable, Plus No Water Needed
Dual Heating Elements Heats Stones to 122° F in about 10 minutes, while outer case remains cool
Color:Blue. A great addition for your practice at an affordable price!
